lines.text: Nicholas! We care about you! We used to be like you. We thought nobody cared.
But we were wrong. Now we want to be your friends, Nicholas, and make sure you're never alone again. Believe us, Nicholas! Believe us.
I... I believe you!
No! You can't! Don't do it! Stop! You don't care! They don't care!
[as they dangle precariously from a tree]
Secret Bear says not to worry about falling - worry about the lion instead!
Hi. I'm Friend Bear, and this is Secret Bear. We're Care Bears.
What do you want?
Only to be your friends.

[narrating]
You see, although Kim and Jason were warm and loving children, they had been so hurt when their parents went away that they decided never to love anyone ever again just incase they too went away. Kim and Jason felt they didn't need anyone, but the Care Bears knew better.
Everyone needs friends, Jason. Even you and Kim.
We're not your friends!
And how do you know our names?
We know a lot of things about you. Kim reads a lot of books and wants to be a nurse when she grows up, and Jason, you want to be a jet pilot.
Yeah. How did you know that?
Friends are supposed to know about each others' hopes and dreams.
[Secret Bear whispers to Friend Bear]
Secret Bear says not to worry. No one can keep a secret like Secret Bear.
Well, I'll tell you what we know about people you care for. They always let you down.
So, we'd rather not have any friends. Don't trouble yourselves!
Nicholas, what have you done?
Only what they did to me. They deserved it.
No, Nicholas. Please, listen!
Quick, Nicholas!
"Nyx... byx... styx!"
This is only the beginning.
This is a job for all the Care Bears!
Tenderheart! Tenderheart! The caring meter dropped two whole points!
[everyone gasps]
A lot of people must have suddenly just stopped caring.
What could have caused that?
The same thing that caused the cloud quake. A boy named Nicholas is being taken over by an evil spirit.
An evil spirit?
So, what happens when the caring meter drops to zero?
No one in the world will care anymore.
[Secret Bear whispers to Kim]
And the end of Care-A-Lot?
I think that's exactly what the spirit has in mind!
Kim! Jason! We're ready! All set?
No. We're not going to the orphanage. We're going to help you.
Yeah.
But... you have parents waiting.
We've made up our minds.
You showed us how to share our feelings, and that's just what we're going to do.
Yeah? Really?
Yeah.
Well, whaddya know? The Rainbow Rescue Beam worked!
See? We just needed a little luck.
Looks like we're going to need more than that.
I think things will get a lot easier now that we're together, Brave Heart.
I couldn't agree with you more, Lotsa Heart. Soon, you'll be out of the Forest of Feelings, then your journey will really begin.
You're not coming with us?
Well... yes... if you think we could help.
Glad to have you along. We can use all the help we can get!
Well, in that case...
[roars]
[trumpets]
We're calling for the Loyal Hearts where ever they may be!
We're calling for the Proud Hearts to come and follow me!
We're calling for the Gentle Hearts to keep us company!
And it would be a Treat Heart if you would follow me!

[singing]
'Cuz there's a job to be done, we're gonna need everyone / because nobody can do it alone. / We'll need the swift and the small, we'll need the strong and the tall / 'cuz everyone has a strength of their own. / And when you put it all together, / Then there's a power no one can deny. / It's the power to share, it's the power to care / 'cuz when you care, you're not afraid to try!
There. The spell is cast. Now, everyone in town will know the loneliness they've made me feel.
Not quite. Look. These two children still care very much about everyone... except you.
But they were to fall under my spell.
Ah, but those soft little bears shield them from your spell with their... love and caring.
Ah, let them go. I'm even now.
Are you? What about all the others?
Others?
All the others that you have not yet cast your spells on. All the others that still care.
I've gotten even with the whole town. That's all I wanted.
The others will come after you for what you've done.
What should I do?
You must finish it! Go ahead! Say it!
Neebo, weebo, tick tock, reebo, zeebo, zip zap, zock! AAH!
[releases a cloud with evil eyes into the room]
This spell will seek out the children and bring them to us at any cost!
Isn't there another way?
No! They must be taught a lesson! A lesson for the children! A lesson for the town! A lesson for everyone!
What do you mean everyone?
Now, go!
[the cloud leaves]
You said a lesson. What kind of lesson?
Never mind that. You must now collect the ingredients for your next spell.
Baby Hugs! Baby Tugs! What have you done?
It's obvious, Grumpy Bear. They got the Rainbow Rescue Beam working.
But we still don't know if it'll transport anyone.
Look!
[a rainbow beam shoots down on the machine, and Friend Bear, Secret Bear, Kim and Jason appear]
Oh my stars! You brought visitors! What are they doing here?
We didn't bring them. They just came along. Someone brought us here.
I knew it! Baby bear mischief!
What are we going to do with the children?
I don't know, but this has never happened before. Perhaps we can let them stay.
Hey! Can we say something? Where are we?
Oh, we're terribly sorry. Bears?
We're the Care Bears!

[unenthusiastically]
More friends?
Welcome to Care-A-Lot!
Come on. We'll give you a tour.
Okay, but we're not gonna like it.
Come on, Swift Heart!
I'm way ahead of you.
I didn't mean it.

Ugh! You never mean it, Nicholas! I bought that box full of junk I could use for my magic act, and now half of it's broken! What am I going to do with you? Every time I give you a simple task to do, it's BOOM this and CRASH that!
I'm sorry, Mr. Fetucini.

Enough of your sorries. Check that trunk and see if there's anything left I can use in my magic act. I have a show to put on. Perhaps, one day, I will teach you how to make an audience love you, but right now, you're next to hopeless.

[singing]
You'll need a friend to get a big job done.

[singing]
I guess sometimes two heads are better than one.

[singing]
You'll need a friend to let your feelings free.

[singing]
Sure could use someone to talk to me.
It's not going to work! Even the spell won't defeat them!
The spell was just having a little sport. The children are it's true target. Perhaps a sprinkle of toadstool mold will speed things up.
Any luck fixing the Rainbow Rescue Beam?
I think I've used up all my good luck getting this far.
Maybe your luck's run out, but not mine.
I need a piece that looks like this.
Try that. It's Baby Hugs' lollypop.
Perfect! You know, baby Hugs and Tugs are going to make fine Care Bears one of these days.
While Brave Heart's gone, let's play a guessing game. What am I?
[sees the tree monster]
Ahh!
[hyper gibberish]
Gee, I don't know.

[shouts]
Look out!
Swift Heart, are you alright?
You bet, Friend Bear! It takes more than that to slow me down!
Where are Kim and Jason?
Maybe they're hiding and are afraid to show themselves.
Okay, Brave Heart, you round up your friends and try to find Kim and Jason. Care Bears, follow me.
What are you going to do, Tender Heart?
We have to try and get through to Nicholas.
And make him believe that we really do care about him.
And that he really cares about everyone else.
With a Care Bear stare?
That's right, Cozy Heart.
I wish there was some way we could express our feelings like that.
There's always a way around others to share your feelings, Gentle Heart. Always.
Jason, do you still have the key that I gave you?
Sure do.
Good. Now promise me that you and Kim will stay as far away from Nicholas and the spirit as you can.
But I want to help.
You can help best by guarding that key.
But...
If we lose that key, Jason, we can never win.
I understand, Tender Heart. You can count on me.
They're on their way!

[wakes up with a start]
Ah! Here?
You'll be ready for them.
How?
By completing your final spell.
Final spell?
You must gather the elements quickly. When those two children arrive, they must be all that is left of caring in this world.
You don't mean...?
Yes! Everyone must be taught the lesson!
But...
Don't you see, Nicholas? It's too late to stop now! You must finish what you started! There's no turning back! Ha HA!
[the spirit and Nicholas laugh maniacally]
And a fine story that was, Mr. Cherrywood.

My favorite, Mrs. Cherrywood. But they never stay awake long enough for the end. Now, they'll never know what eventually became of Nicholas. I guess all they need to know is that he too lived happily ever after. Happier than I ever thought I could be.
Nicholas, these children should have been in bed ages ago. What am I ever going to do with you?
Care for me, Mrs. Cherrywood, just care for me.
I'm Cozy Heart Penguin. Helping someone in need is what warms my heart and keeps me cozy.
[Cozy Heart splashes in the water and gets Tender Heart all wet]
Brrr! Well, it must work, Cozy Heart. This water is freezing!
I love it!
Secret Bear says not to worry. No one can keep a secret like Secret Bear.
How come I'm always the one fixing things around here?
Because you never complain, Grumpy Bear.
This little star got itself stuck in the gears.
Now, that's what I call star-stuck, Grumpy Bear.

[seeing the rainbow rescue beam]
What's this thing, Tugs?
It's not a thing, Hugs. It's a... thingamadooey.
You know everything, Tugs! What's it do?
Uh... it makes bubbles. Square bubbles.
Square bubbles? Hoowee! Make square bubbles, Tugs!
Any special color?
[tries out the rainbow rescue beam by pressing it's buttons]
No square bubbles, Tugs. Not even round ones. You broke the thing.
Wow. This doesn't look like the Earth I remember.
Maybe we're still in Care-A-Lot.
If this is Care-a-lot, then someone's been doing a little gardening since we left.
What happened to all your fur?
We never had any fur.
That's impossible! Every monkey has fur!
And who said they were monkeys?
Well... they were up in a tree.
I know. They're lions with haircuts.
My bed is cozy and light as a cloud.
Your bed *is* a cloud.

[laughs]
Oh, yeah.
Hey, you're a lot smaller than you sound.
It's true that I'm not big, but it's amazing what you can do if you really put your heart into it.
[trumpets]
Sometimes, I even startle myself.
A world without caring? This doesn't look like the Earth you talked about.
We've got stop it before it gets worse.
I don't think this place could get any worse.
Nicholas, I just had the most wonderful dream! I dreamed I changed my poster! So that's just what I'm going to do! Now, it'll read "Fetucini and Nicholas"! So, what do you say? A partnership.
Par... par... par...
Oh, all right. "Nicholas and Fetucini".
Now, off to bed to dream of clowns and circuses, acrobats and jugglers. And remember, I want a full report in the morning.
No, Secret Bear. I don't think it was the cloud-mobile's fault.
Where did you come from?
Why, we live here. Everyone in the Forest of Feelings knows of Playful Heart Monkey and Brave Heart Lion.
Forest of Feelings?
Well, we're from Earth.
And Care-A-Lot.

[laughs]
Earth? Care-A-Lot?
[laughs]
There's no such place!
[laughs]
There is too!
Don't mind Playful Heart. He loves to laugh at anything. I've heard tales long ago about... other places. What are these other places like?

Our friends at the Forest of Feelings have proven to everyone that there's always a way to show that you care. And so, the purpose of this festive occasion is to let all bear witness to the inaguration of our friends into the Care Bear Family!
Oh, thank you so much! You won't be dissappointed, I promise! I can't believe this! I owe it all to the Care Bears, and...
To who?
Yeah, uh... er, um... friends. My best friends, Mr. Fetucini.

[laughs]
Friends. That's what it's all about, Nicholas, my boy. That's what it's all about.
Who are you? How do you know my name?
I am a spirit, Nicholas. Your friend. I know many things... almost everything.
Everything?
I know how you can earn more friends.
Really? How?
With magic.
Magic?
[turns to Mr. Fettuccini]
Oh, not his magic tricks. I mean real magic. Magic that can make your fondest wish come true.
You mean you can use magic to get people to like me?
No, but you could. All you have to do is undo the lock.
Well done, Nicholas. He'll be in a deep sleep only long enough for you to take over his magic show.
But I... I couldn't!
Yes, you can. You must! This is your chance to show that you are a greater magician than he. They love him for his magic, they'll love you for your's. I'll help you.
Nicholas! Stop! This isn't the way to make friends!
Who are you?
I'm Tender Heart. A Care Bear. Your friend.
Friend? Where was he when you needed him?
What matters is I'm here now, and Nicholas needs me the most.
[the Spirit angrily growls and blows Tender Heart away]
See, Nicholas? Magic can do anything you want it to.
Hey, neat!
Magic isn't the answer, Nicholas. Your feelings can help you find the true answer.
Don't listen to him! There are dozens of children out there waiting to see your magic.
They'll love me just like they did the Great Fetuccini! I know all his tricks. I'm not doing anything wrong.
He won't succeed! The spirit doesn't care about him, but I do!
I just need a little more time.
That's the one thing we don't have! The Caring Meter's dropped to three! In no time, it'll fall to zero, and that's the end of Care-A-Lot!
We care about everyone, even when they don't care about us.
And right now, the one we care about most is you, Nicholas. You.
As long as Kim and Jason still care, his spell is not complete.
Maybe we can still save him.
We can still save him!
But how?
Just feel it.
Lotsa Heart, do you think this river might lead us down to Earth?
Well, it has to go somewhere.
I guess Care-A-Lot is safe and sound again.
And as long as Care-A-Lot is safe, so is the world below it.
[as the audience laughs at Nicholas]
Make them stop laughing! Make them stop!
Only you can do that. Here - teach them a lesson.
A lesson?
Come on! Make us laugh!
One they'll never forget!

[reads]
Simmer-sot, Ra dee tar...
Nicholas, no!
...Tazork nee!
[There is a thunderclap. The kids in the audience instantly start brawling]
Now they know how you've felt all your life, without a friend in the world. Now, they feel nothing!

[narrating]
It was hard to believe that only a short time ago, this was a place of happiness and joy. Now, without love to keep it alive, it had become a home of fear, loneliness and ruin.

[narrating]
No matter what happened, Nicholas now knew that someone would be watching over him at all times. But most of all, Nicholas learned that the best way to make friends, is to be a friend yourself.

[steps in something]
Huh? Icky, sticky bubblegum! The last ingredient I need for my final spell!
[cackles]
Let them try and stop me now!
Quick! Run for cover! It's coming! Brace yourselves!
What's coming?
[a huge cloud quake happens]
Everyone okay? Cheer Bear?
I think so.
Too bad we can't say the same for Care-A-Lot. Look.
Oh no!
Everything's broken! Faded! Ruined!
I've sighted parents for you at the orphanage! They want to adopt you both!
Congratulations, Kim and Jason!
Come on, Grumpy! Let's warm up the rainbow rescue beam! Kim and Jason have to get back in a hurry!
You hear that, Jason? Parents.
Yeah. I thought we'd never have parents.
Yeah.
But... Kim...
I know, Jason. Our friends. They're in trouble.
The Care Bears have a very special mission, and that mission is to help everyone share their feelings with others.
Thanks to the Care Bears, Kim and Jason remembered how good it was to have friends who cared. They're troubles were over, but as for Nicholas, his troubles were just beginning.
You're welcome to stay in the Forest of Feelings as long as you like.
Thank you, Brave Heart, but the sooner we leave, the better. If we don't hurry, Care-A-Lot may not be there when we get back.
We have to find a way back to Earth.
To help stop the evil spirit from taking the feelings away from everybody.
Come on, everybody!
Where?
If there is a way out of the Forest of Feelings, we'll help you find it.
That's the most unfriendly tree I've ever seen!
You're right, Secret Bear. Our only hope is a Care Bear Stare. I hope it works. There's only two of us.
[Secret Bear moves like a boxer]
Right again! We've got to try!
Jason! Kim! You're alright!
Thanks to our new friends.
I know exactly what you mean.
Where are they? Where are you hiding the boy and girl?
You don't know what you're doing, Nicholas! Listen to your heart, and you'll find the truth!
WHERE ARE THEY?
Care Bears, STARE!
Look! I'm hydroplaning!
[trapped in a cave]
I can't see a thing.

[appears]
Steer to the left!
Who said that?
Not me.
Neither did I.
Wasn't me.
It was me! I said it!
Who are you?
Don't ask questions - steer left, quick!
Hang on, everyone.
Whew! That was close - you almost smashed right into that big rock!
Look, I see light up ahead.
[the ship comes into the light again]
A raccoon? No wonder you could see in the dark.
Not just a raccoon - Bright Heart Raccoon.
I can usually see my way through anything.
Hey, Jason, aren't parents great?
Yeah.
